section1.title: The client
section1.body: The LITE/DARK concept was deliciously straighforward. Just coffee and juices, fruit and chocolate. All organic, hand made and and fair-trade.

section2.title: Brand identity
section2.body: Consumers have less time and the amount of content fighting for their attention is overwhelming. Traditional advertising is often money wasted.
